mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTNAMEEN, WEIGHT, COSTPRICE, SELLPRICE, SAVENUM, OPER1, OPER2, SHOPTYPE, SHOPTYPEID, PICTUREURL, EBAYITEMID, EBAYSITE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, CATEGORYID, CATEGORY, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME from DB_GIFT where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTNAMEEN, WEIGHT, COSTPRICE, SELLPRICE, SAVENUM, OPER1, OPER2, SHOPTYPE, SHOPTYPEID, PICTUREURL, EBAYITEMID, EBAYSITE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, CATEGORYID, CATEGORY, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME from DB_GIFT
